content.rendered:
Du Dang 

IT Manager
BS in Information Technology: Phoenix University

 

Hi, I’m Du Dang. As the IT Manager ATR, I oversee all company servers and networks infrastructure.  I design and setup the company’s global network structure and security, configure and maintain WAN and LAN network devices, Sonicwall & Watchguard Firewall and our VPN. I’m responsible for technical support, resolving issues that involve network, hardware, and operating systems.  Though my role is not one the front lines of recruiting, I know that the technology that underpins all our work is critical to our success in matching candidates and clients.

 

INSPIRATIONAL QUOTE:

“Be as a bird perched on a frail branch that she feels bending beneath her, still she sings away all the same, knowing she has wings.” -Victor Hugo
